content: Game straight up cheats. Buggy. Purchased unique food from the Inn, not given victory points. If on the same location, opponents will always go first, regardless of what turn order should be.
Excellent implementation of a beautiful, if simple, game.
i don't understand what i'm supposed to do. game is beautiful though.
Scoring is bugged in online games, each player gets a different winner/total score!

I bought this to play with a friend so we wouldn't have to manually keep score, but when we finished our first game our screens showed different point totals at the end. If the game can't even do the math right then it's worthless. Experienced a game breaking bug with chubei at the inn on our second try. Too bad because this is one of my favorite board games and it looks polished otherwise. The crossroads expansion was also 'coming soon' years ago and it looks like they've abandoned it now.
Scam. Uninstalled and it still takes money each month

Buggy-ass game but with good fundamentals. WAY too punishing in its tendency to kick players for inactivity. Also the screen kept autorotating upside down then right side up. Both when I had autorotate enabled on my phone, AND when it was disabled. You also can't exit the game and reliably find a way to re-enter the same game. Please developers, fix the bugs! Open source it if necessary!

Though the game is fun the online feature doesn't work. You can't play with other players even though it shows other people are online. You can make a game but no one will ever join and there are never any games open to join. The only thing that shows up where the open games would be listed is a loading icon. It's rather unfortunate you can only play with AI because it makes for a very limited experience. I really wish they'd fix the online features.

I really enjoy the easiness of the game, however, it sometimes bugs out in solo e.g my token gets stuck in limbo outside the inn after selecting a visitor gift, not being able to scroll the map. I might have been fine with a few bugs but we have to pay to play...
I'd still like to buy the expansions though!
Doesnt work, cannot tap anything on the main menu.
Wonderful
Fun little game, but lacks variation for long term fun.
Wonderful game! I love it! Please, please, please add the expansions!
Fun, beautiful, soothing, and strategic. What's not to love??
Didn't work. Screen wouldn't register anything, so I could not even view the tutorial, let alone play the game.
Very well designed and a great adaptation. However, I wish that the expansions were implemented

Good game. Would be great if there was a 'lite' version of the map without the background graphics. The graphics are pretty but it makes the game very slow even on fast ai mode. Would love just a simple gane map and graphics only when you enter a shop. This would mean I could play more games as they wouldn't take as long.
There is no point playing the game unless the developer fixed its scoring system at the end
Really fun and beautiful. You can play this with friend too!
Easy to learn tutorial. Just like the board game but pocket sized.
Gentle rewarding trips.
It is so nice that so beautiful board game is available for phone.
Well crafted game truly amazing just epic
Too many connection issues, sadly.
Great game, but after reinstalling the game and reseting my password it wouldn't accept the new password.

Game is unplayable - won't register any taps/buttons that I try to press. I adore the original board game & was excited 2 play the mobile version, but I can't even start the tutorial let alone do anything else in the app.
Beautiful adaptation from the board game.
Has Buddha nature. Go on vacation for ten minutes.
Peaceful, gentle, strategy game. You have to play each player with a slightly different strategy because they each have different strengths. It's not difficult to play and is not stressful.
I paid for an app, not advertisements for your Kickstarter for an unrelated game. Please either refund everyone for the app, or stop the advertising.
An excellent redition of the board game. The interface is intuitive and graphics are gorgeous, and really capture the "zen-like" feel of the original table top game.
Notification spam
Funforge uses this game to show me notifications ads about their kickstarters. Didn't pay for that, didn't accept anything, not cool.
This was a great way to learn how to play this beautiful game!
Nicely made, few bugs. The back button doesn't work, and there isn't a review of all the rules anywhere. Tutorial was helpful, but not complete.
A great app for a great game. It is a shame though that the expansions are not available.
App is glitchy in multiplayer, including players showing different scores and bonuses. But overall it's pretty and fun.
Don't get it, a waste of money

I finally got around to opening the game, and I literally can't do anything. I get the opening screen and no ability to click on any buttons. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling. I want a fix or my money returned.
Connectivity issues

Slow, boring, TERRIBLE instructions What controls? You literally have 1 option to "do" at any time. I think you need to get victory points? But who goes when is really vague unless you're all standing in a single file line. Oh and the computer players all seem to understand the strategy, they don't bother to even give you a hint.

A beautiful recreation of the game, this app is unfortunately riddled with glitches and errors. This seems to be worse for Android than iOS. I would give the game 5 stars if they could fix the programming.
Crashes or lags and when it does work the scoring at the end doesnt work and a scrambled screen appears
The game is somewhat laggy and the matchmaking is snail-paced. It's better to play this with your friends offline or play with the A.I.
I cant play pls fix :(

I wanted to give this game 5 stars. I own the boardgame and it's one of my favorite! I enjoy playing it so much that I dropped extra cash for the expansion with the mini figs and soundtrack. Unfortunately the online play is full of bugs, crash, and has only 20 players . There are times where it doesn't do the end game total correctly. I just finished a game where I won chatterbox achievement and it gave it to someone who never stopped at encounter spot. This is why no one plays. Please fix this.
Can't set up multiplayer game between friends and there is no help section to help me.

The game is great but seriously need to do something about the kick timer online. After about 20 seconds players get kicked and arent replaced by bots so the game cannot be finished. Also no resume function when leaving games. EDIT 22-3-2020: took away another star as consistently the bonuses at the end of the game are not being counted for some players and all the players in the game are being shown a different victor for the game. Kind of makes game pointless if it doesnt even give victory.
Beautiful adaptation of a great board game. The only issue is the bugs. You don't get your ability the final inn and the game crashes if there are any ties for achievements.
Not bad

The game is fun but buggy. I have issues with not being able to purchase food at the inn when I had enough coins and the game kept telling me I didn't. Sometimes, at the end of the game, the end ranking cannot be loaded and at times, I somehow was ranked lower then someone that had 3 points less than me. Some players take so long to make a move that they really should have been kicked out by the game and when nothing happens for 2-3 mins, I have to manually leave the game.
Fun game once you get the hang of it. However, the scoring is broken. Two of us play the game and the points are different for each of us at the end.... Also the awards at the end often glitch out.

Cute and relaxing game that can be played solo against computer players, or local multiplayer with pass and play and also online against others. Interestingly the premise of winning by having the best holiday is twisted by the fact that tactics to win revolve around ruining other player's holidays by blocking them off from places or forcing them to miss out. 3 stars - the game is relaxing and playable but has final scoring glitches that can change who wins when playing multiplayer.

The game is great overall, but there are still some problems. 1) when i had an encounter, my goods goes to another oponent, it also happen when I go to get painting pieces, 2) the ranking at the end of the game usually crashes, 3) when creating a game room I dont know who joined and I had to create a new room whenever it's not my friend who joined, you should give more host priority like removing a player and knowing who has joined, 4) sever overloading and reconnecting during game also
Enjoyed it! However, the game micro-lags from time to time. Perhaps it can be fixed. Overall, nice experience. Also, are new characters available for purchase? Could not find the option though.
Need to fix the achievement portion, always glitches out.

Decent, but single player is lacking. The AI is very weak and has no options to increase or adjust difficulty. Achievements also don't work at all in single player. There's no rules reference to go back and look up how something works; you can replay the tutorial but that's it.
Great adaptation of the great board game.

Beautiful and fun board game. Just can be annoying when u have to wait for people n they dont move maybe they have bad internet i dont know. I wish the board bigger or longer n more option. The game itself super fun feel like im really travelling!! I love it!! The graphic so beautiful too!!
It's definitely a good game, but for me it was one time experience. No bugs spotted
I always get stuck in the middle of the game. Everything just stops
I put three because, well, the game won't run on my Razer. Been trying for a couple weeks now.

Please fix the game it has a bug not giving us Google achievements .there are achievements where you choose the characters and finish game it not working.......please fix it..........( edit fix the game now ....üò°üò°üò° so many days have passed no fix update ü§¨ fix the issue of not giving players the Google achievements.,) .
It's not recording achievements, which is annoying.

It was a really grea adaptation of the boardgame. However, I have experienced a number of bugs while playing. 1) I had an encounter and the points and coins I gained from there went to my opponent. 2) I bought 2 souvenirs and they were charged, but they didn't go into my possession. 3) Results are often buggy and hangs a couple of times. Please fix these. Thank you!
Lots of in-game glitches, needs improvement
I love this game on the board and playing it on the screen was so cute. I loved it
Beautiful game, decent AI for solo play, lack of online multiplayer rooms and bugs with google play achievements means its 4 not 5 star.
Nothing particularly interesting.

Gives the full boardgame experience. Online play was greatly appreciated. However I would like to point out 2 bugs I encountered: 1. Player with highest score is not declared winner at the end of online games. 2. My screen glitches out after the announcement of the player with most donations. I can provide screenshots if needed. Hope to hear from the dev.
Beautiful adaption of a boardgame, although I feel the core gameplay is somewhat lacking. Will the expansion be developed for the Android version?
I like the game but due to bugs it keeps freezing when I play with friends
Fun competitive game! Beautiful artwork and graphics.
Good game. The parts of the tutorial don't work though
Hope they update with more characters and the expansions plus some of the standard game play is also not available. But it looks stunning and is nice distraction right now!

Played with a friend and game is great but after the time runs out for the person to make their move it kicks then out of the game and they can't join again. Can you please make the person automatically do something when time runs out instead of kick then out of the game?
Fun game but the achievements does not work which is annoying

Decent. Mimics the board game and the animations are great. Any longer on the NPCs turn would have been too much. FOREVER one game used 30% battery! Search Amass Games on YouTube for board game how to setup play and reviews thanks. More explanation of the sets would have helped in the tutorial and how ties worked and maybe not going to the Inn with little money. Even though it's listed as muted, the game starts with sound
It's a fun game if all the bugs are fixed. Points are added to wrong character when play with friends. Random people can join friends game. End game point calculation is a mess. Disappointed..
Good game. I played the real boardgame version as well, and this is quite similar. Gameplay is fast and fun, and rules are simple!

Beautiful Concept, Garbage Execution. They did all the difficult things right and all the easy things wrong! *AI turns take FOREVER with no way to speed up or skip long repetitive animations. Basically unplayable for this alone. * UI is very inconsistent - needs to be more clear to double tap, not tap to select and then arrow to accept or "are you sure" prompt if skip * Pan and Zoom is glitchy and jumpy, locking to arbitrary points Team clearly skipped UX and playtesting. Easy easy fixes.
Best game ever love the art style
Bring on the expansion
i touch everywhere and the game doesnt do anything . just music and main menu please fix
Touch screen does not work on tablet SAMSUNG-SM-T818V

The game is great. The app works fine for the most part. But the UI bugs sometimes. The animations when moving to a new location should be faster, either by default or there has to be an option in the settings to turn them off. With some work this up can be a 5-star.

I've been playing the app version of this game for a couple of months now and have also played the physical boardgame. I love it and it's also visually very beautiful. Now that more people are using the app however it's become apparent that even if you select 'Play with Friends' other random members of the public can jump into your game. There's no password protection on it and the game you think you're making for just friends is also visible in the public online section. Please fix this quickly

Fun, pretty game. I like that you can play on or offline, and with friends pass and play or online, or strangers online, but I don't like that it's not recording my achievements at all. For example it says there are achievements for each character to win with over a certain amount of points. I've done that with most characters in solo and online play, and no achievements.
Fun and relaxing game. However, there seems to be some connection issues while on data and WiFi. Friends also would disconnect randomly during games.
Beautiful board game
Offline pass and play is great for playing with friends and family.
It would have been fun if I had the chance to play. Most of the time on that game I spend 9n waiting and you got to have a real amount of patience to even get the chance to experience that

Here are my 5 stars. Graphically beautiful and stunning game. I played it for a while, and the time just passed. It's simple nature is quite addictive and makes me happy, when I play this game. The only problem I have with this game is in Public Room, there aren't many players who play in my region, so I have to wait for like 15 mins for just 1 more player. That's why I just play Offline mode, which is quite excellent too. Thank you for bringing this to mobile. I'm highly grateful.üòä‚úåÔ∏è
If you are having the issue where you can't click the main menu and you have the Samsung Game Launcher, turn off the 'Disable back and menu buttons' feature.
Played with friends online but never finished one. Due to bugs. üòÖ
I love the game, but the achievments do not unlock. This is the only game where this is a problem. If they fix this, 5 stars!
Really interesting experience, for the person who replays often
Woww!!! Great game

Great graphics and really brings the board game to life! Also great you don't have to play a CD to keep music on. Animations are cute! Only problem is none of the three expansions incorporated and the basic game is just too... Well basic. Barely and strategy without at least the first expansion
Decent game, but failure to retain mute settings is a problem.
Have played 2 games and froze both times when opponents AI are in the panorama spot on day 3.

At most of the games, at final points calculation there's a glitch and it's calculating incorrect number of points. This happened to me at least 5-6 times already. Please fix this issue, this is literally breaking the game
Currently stuck at the menu, the start the tutorial button doesn't respond, even the settings
So much fun! So easy to play so hard to master.
Really enjoyed this. Have the board game with painted minis so it's cool seeing them animated.

Love this boardgame, app needs work. Has several bugs. Just ran into a game breaking bug with temples. On 4th day I went to Temple to donate when I had 10 already donated previously. It wouldn't let me donate any even though I had 3 coins, and it wouldn't let me leave. Eventually it booted me from the game with my friend.
Please fix it. I uninstall-reinstall it but it still won't work. I can't choose anything on the screen. :(
üòÄ
Not able to play with friends. Will give 5 stars when this problem is fixed

The gameplay is good.. But it have so many bugs.. Later i just win the match but the screen goes error like glitching.. And then when i switch application for a while.. The game is stuck.. And then i can't scroll the map anymore.. On my early game, i can scroll the map.. One more thing, its should be good if you can increase the variety of characters..

Website has been in maintenance mode for the past week. Cannot log on as it says my password is wrong but gives no option to change or correct it so no multi-player. Game itself is fine but app is pretty buggy with connection issues.
Cant click any button in the first page.. No any action

I tried this game for the illustration, and then stayed for the beautiful gameplay. How 1 road would have so many strategies to explore and try. I had my fun trying each of the characters too. Added with the soothing music, this game is one of the most pleasant board games I've ever played. One thing, I hope they would add a timer for when we play online. It's annoying when another player takes too long, probably from connection problem or something. I hope they would fix/add other alternatives

Great game except after my first time opening the app, it just stopped working. Every time after my first time, I can't press any of the buttons. It's entirely unresponsive. Everything else on my phone works perfectly. I reinstalled and then had the same experience. First time works, but all other times don't.

I'm honestly unsure of what I expected when downloading this game. I thought the game looked nice one day, I slapped it in to my wishlist, and waited for it to be on sale. Once I saw it was temporarily on sale, I downloaded it. Upon downloading it said it would give me a tutorial and I honestly understood nothing it said. The instructions were very vague and it really only told you to choose one or two characters before jumping in and telling you to scroll and choose a space. Music was good.
I wanna get my achievements, thank you
This is a great game, the artwork is superb, it is simple though very deep. I never played the tabletop version and this game made me want to do it. I will try yhe physical first chance I got to.

I haven't seen any mention of the board game's expansions, and there's no option (that I've seen) to play from Edo to Kyoto. It looks great, but there's too much reliance on vibrant color popping on white. The game could use a touch more to color it. Something like this needs more life to it, options that make the game endlessly replayable instead of tediously eternal. I like what I see, but the game feels too much like how it looks -- patches of color on an otherwise empty canvas.
Multiplayer and connectivity functions are limited. Rooms cannot be made private for friends to join in public arena. Connection is slow. Search function is very basic. Graphics are nice.
Interesting and beautiful board game, too bad the achievement doesn't work
Could be a good game but the AI just moves to the nearest available spot almost every time so the game loses most of what made the board game good.
Thank you. Much appreciated.
Noice
Love the game and the offline experience, but playing online is a painful, patience-testing experience.
Beautiful game but really hard to set up a room with friends! Other people keep appearing in the rooms though we set it up through 'play with friends'
Can't get past the start screen. None of the buttons work. I tried reinstalling, but no difference.
The design and game is nice. But when I try to create a room for friends it opens up to the public instead.
Boring.
Can't even join my friend's game, server lag as heck, and game crashed frequent.

The game has a bug, if I play as Chuubei and have already completed a panoramic view. When I visit the inn and meet someone who adds a section to a different panoramic view I become unable to choose a food from the inn. It gets stuck on my turn indefinitely. I have to restart and lose my game.

I don't know the board game version, but this game is fun, and the controls and rules are pretty simple. The graphics are pretty beautiful!!! Eu n√£o conhe√ßo a vers√£o de jogo de tabuleiro deste jogo, mas o achei divertido, e os controles e regras s√£o simples. Os gr√°ficos s√£o muito bonitos!

Started it up and none of the buttons reacted to anything for some reason. Playing on a Mi8. Edit: Mysteriously started working today, no complaints remaining. Beautiful and faithful adaptation of the analog board game.
Very beautiful and chill game, which I enjoy a lot. Account creation for online gaming has crashed though.

Good game! Some requests to the dev: 1) Ability to remove the hints on what to do 2) A local multiplayer option so we don't have to pass and play 3) A more zoomed in view, so we can see what the characters are doing better
google play achievements unclearable, but other than that a great port of the original board game
Very nice game! Online login didnt work for me tough
Very relaxing

4/5 star, overall it's a great game, great art design and gameplay, it's a fun game to kill time. The only downside is the server, i can't connect to the server, it always says server connection error, hope you guys can fix it quickly.
Cannot even get it to work after installing
Boring and dull
Wonderful

Artstyle and animations are beautiful even though the latter are really too slow when playing with AI or other player (please add an option to speed up the movements). Strategy wise is not challenging or competitive enough but at least it is a relaxing experience. Giving 1* cause online doesn't work at the moment, otherwise it's a 3* game.
Couldn't get past the Start screen.
thanks for making it free for sometime
Beautiful game with very exciting game play. Learn a few words in Japanese too
game is fun. pls Improve your game every thing too slow(system)
Constant connection issues. Keeps popping up with "Connect, please wait a moment" but never connects at all.
Super super lag
The game doesn't repond, just keep "connecting" over and over

"Connecting.. Please wait a moment.." I've been looking forward to playing this game online multiplayer with friends.. but the notification above keeps on showing even though I've waited for 10mins... spoils the mood for anyone who has to wait that long just to play a game.. Not gonna change my stars review until some improvements been made...

I have the game installed on a LG V20, but I can't click on anything at the menu. The sound and the animations are playing at the menu right after I open the app, it logs in my Google account, but I can't start the tutorial or click in any other button. I've heard great things about the board game, and I am looking forward to try this app. I am just waiting on a solution and I'll rate the game properly.
Love the board game! Well done on the app!
Very relaxing game and gives a good glimpse on Japanese culture. Some minor improvement can be done on the controls as some inputs does not register immediately.

Would give 3.5 if I could. The board game itself is wonderful. Seems well balanced and interesting to play with all the different characters. The app is overall really nice. Decent graphics and runs smoothly. A few things I think would really improve it though: 1) When buying from the merchant (or interacting with any space), it would be nice to still see the board. I appreciate the graphics, but sometimes I need to see the board.
I wish the other characters are available and we can do reverse map

I can't complain too much because it's free but I got it specifically because I haven't played the board game. The tutorial is sparse. Graphics are nice but too small for a phone screen. Most annoyingly, I can't understand the final scores. There's a breakdown for every player but they don't seem to add up. Since I don't have the board game I have no idea what if anything is wrong.
AMAZING. EXCELLENT WORK.
I love this game as a boardgame. When I found out it was for free on Google Play I had to get it.

I had initial login issues with the game until I restarted the app. It wouldn't let me enter a username or password. Now the game runs great. The only thing keeping it from 5-star is the online functionality. Connecting takes a while, sometimes times out, and the lobby function needs enhancement. You should be able to see other games while waiting in a current game for it to fill. Games should also auto-start once filled to prevent delays (or at least have an option to set it as such).
Beautiful graphics, peaceful music, and great game. Pure strategy, and very little luck is involved

Seems to be alright mostly. Noticed that buttons on whichever side of the screen is the to if the phone don't seem to all respond. Have to rotate the phone so they're at the bottom and then they work. At least on my Mi9 lite.

A wonderful game, reflects the actual board game well, but my experience in the public game is pretty bad. I played a 5 Traveler game and one of my opponent doesn't show up on the road map, it kept showing 2 person as one. After that, one of the opponent is not responding so I had to quit. My movement was bugged too in the middle of the game, like moving me to a location I never clicked. In one of the Inn, all the food was gone, for some reason.
Unable to connect online.
I love the digital adaptation of the game, but will we ever see the expansions? Also how do I unlcok new characters?
Cant play with people because, on online mode no player online

Slow paced game with a very nice presentation. Strategy and choice paths are low. So, it does feel like auto play at times. Hoping they'll come out with the crossroads expansion at some point to mitigate that... Had some issues on S10 but the devs pushed out a patch after a few emails. Performs well now, only had one minor issue in a game so far. I do wish they had a rule book or help menu outside of the tutorial though. I only play offline so I can't give input on online stability.
I really don't feel I'm getting my moneys worth please add a few extension and other cool features the only play is also just so inactive well you never get a opponent

Awesome game. Please add crossroads and matsuri characters and expansions. Also if the only option is to go to the inn please enable the game to auto move the player to the inn in appropriate order...
I have never played the board game version but I love the classic simplicity of the mechanics and how wonderful looking the entire package is

Sasayakkos ability is glitched and doesnt work. The guide is incredibly annoying and there is no option to turn off. The animations of the other players takes way too long. Focused too much on making it pretty and not enough on making it playable.
i like the game but now i cant play it the app wont let me play it.

I really love this game. It is so fun & restful. I'm a really bad loser & i don't have a bad time when I lose this game. Also, this game fits & scales great on my BlackBerry Key2, which has a weird screen with capacitive home/navigation buttons & a physical keyboard & it works in split-screen too. I do have to ask: Fun Forge, are there any plans to bring out the expansions? I love the way the game changes with the expansion characters. Again, love this game - thanks for bringing it to Android!
Easy to learn, fun for a variety of ages. Gorgeous looking game.
It's a good game, beautifully mobilized... but the game itself without the crossroads expansion really cuts down on replayability.
replyContent:
Hi J,

Crossroads is still in development. No schedule has been officially announced on our social media pages. We will release it when we think it's satisfying and when it's the good time to do so.
We appreciate your dedication to Tokaido, and understand than the wait feels long. Sorry for that.

Kind regards,
Funforge Team

content: Hi, I am unable to get the main screen to respond. And it seems that I'm not the only one, I hope the dev's take note and issue a patch swiftly.
The gameplay is good everything are good, but no one play it and please add more new character to fill that blank slot in the character slot

This game looks amazing on the big screen with Samsung Dex. I have it on my Note 8, and Galaxy Tab S2 and it looks gorgeous. But when I hooked my phone to my Dex and 40" screen, I was blown away! I have been using Samsung Dex for almost 2 years now, and it is really a game changer for mobile computing. I can see the characters in a big screen without any lag and in full HD (as compared to mirroring). Please make more games compatilble with Dex.
replyContent:
Hi pylod,
thanks for your feedback. It's good to know that it's compatible with Dex and running well on it with good graphics render!
Hope you can enjoy good times with your friends and family playing Tokaido on the big screen.
Kind regards,
Funforge Team

content: Favorite game on my phone
replyContent:
Favorite comment on my computer screen! ;)
Thomas - Funforge Team

content: Tokaido is a quick fun game. Inability to reconnect online stinks. Isn't giving me credit for any achievements I am completing which is why it can at best be 2 stars
It does not run on my galaxy s6 tab. Only show white screen.

The game is enjoyable offline. You don't get all the characters though. The online experience is not that great. Online player base is non-existent, and if you somehow get a match going you'll find yourself disconnecting or crashing often with no way to reconnect to the game. My biggest wish is that you could reconnect to games.
Visually pleasing, interesting concept
It's a relaxing game.

It plays well, but it would be nice to have a way to randomly assign a character to the user, from among the entire character list (not just 2). This would make the game, at least in solo vs AI mode, more interesting for repeat plays.
replyContent:
Hello Alison,
if you start a solo vs AI game by clicking on the "?" button you will start a game with 2 random characters and you will have to choose one between these two, like in the boardgame.
Kind regards,
Thomas - Funforge Team

content: Love the board game. Wish this app include Crossroads

I've only been able to play one full game. After that, I've been unable to get the game's title screen to respond. I can't start the game, access the profile sign in, the settings, achievements, etc. And I even uninstalled and reinstalled it: same issue. For a premium game, that's unacceptable.
It's really disappointing that the crossroads update never came out and the online multiplayer is non existent.
Nothing but a white screen on my galaxy note 10+. Asking for a refund.
Great game love it

Pretty, but shallow, with some bugs. The good: Pretty artwork, nice music on title screen, exposes you to some Japanese cultural artifacts that you might wish to learn about. The bad: Gameplay ends up very linear, with little strategy. Typical play through is that you and the AI just move to the nearest available space each turn, and one player wins by 2 or 3 points at the end with no obvious reason why. The game chews up over 10% of battery usage in the background. Maybe a notification bug?
Great game. Good time killer and gameplay.
Really nice art n environment but repetitive game play..... Just taking turns to go around n around?
Favorite Game! 6 üåü
What amazing art this game has. And the gameplay is cool, didn't know there's a board game that cool! To think it isn't paid or even have a shop, it's weird, is there somewhere I could pay?
Just couldn't see myself playing this more than once.
Excellent adaptation of a great game.
Seems to be impossible to create an online account and record progress.
Awesome! Two minor bugs/features- 1:no save game. As soon as the app close you loose your data. 2: scrolling on the map is a bit dodgy.
Really fun game. If you like the board game, this is perfect for pass and play road trips.
No one play this game
Relaxing üòäüëçüèª
just as good as the boardgame!
Impossible to play online games. They always get stuck when someone leaves.

Need to improve turn based play with friends. You HAVE to play online and in real time if you lose your connection or need to come back you're kicked from the game and cant come back, it's so stupid. it's a simple mindless game anyway with no real strategy and the online game takes away any choices you have with the board game. the art is nice and the game play is quick and smooth but if you want to play with others, just buy the board game, its awesome.
They canceled the crossroads expansion. Don't purchase.
After teasing Crossroads for over a year they finally just abandoned it. Don't promise something you aren't willing to commit to.

Why does this game need access to my phone call logs? Sorry im tired of companies skimming our personal data for a buck.
replyContent:
Hello Sean,
thanks for pointing this out.
You should be able to denied this permission in the Application menu of your device.
EDIT: To be precise and transparent, READ_PHONE_STATE permission is asked because of the use of "SystemInfo.deviceUniqueIdentifier" in our code only when you create your Funforge Account to link your device to your account.

One of the best board game ports ever. My only thing is I wish it had the expansions as well, I see that the one expansion is there but cannot get it. Hopefully it will be released soon. However it is an awesome port of a board game.

This app is dripping with theme. The game itself is beautiful and pleasure to simply look at. The core game play is fairly simple. You are on a road and need to pick where you want to go in order to gain certain points. There are multiple win objectives so the trick is to focus on your own objective while making it more difficult for the other players. The last person in line keeps taking a turn until there is a new last person in line. This is then repeated until the road ends and the points are tallied. It is pretty fun and the AI provides just enough challenge.

Like the board game from which it's adapted, Tokaido is balanced and compulsively replayable. The downsides are few but significant and one might think that the fixes  areboth common sense and easy.   The view is so zoomed out that otherwise lovely visuals are postage-stamp-inscrutable. You can manually pinch-zoom but only a tiny bit and it resets almost immediately. A deeper zoom that can stick would improve the visual experience two-fold.  The bottom bar which maps the current stretch of road is useful but there is no such feature for the other sections, making it inconvenient-verging-on-impossible to strategize as one might in the actual or desktop version of the game. It really hurts the replay value of the game.   At certain critical points, the player is unable to view rival players' stats or locations on the board. This, too, really diminishes how deeply the game can be appreciated.   The game also requires two deliberately-timed taps on the 'ok' button to end one's turn. Unlike a game such as Catan, there is no reason a turn should not end automatically, particularly when fast AI is turned on. The lack of a true fast play option, again, really impacts replayability.  Overall, the game is enjoyable but frustrating; it plays like a half-heated port of a truly brilliant game. A few quality-of-life changes would bump Tokaido to legendary status.
Great for car rides! Sad about the poor online play üòü.

content: Overall, this is an awesome game adaptation, but please add a local multiplayer mode via bluetooth to add more flexibility and convenience instead of the poor online match making mode. Thanks in advance and more power!

I am addicted to this game. Tokaido is what I would consider a modern classic. The game play is simple and exciting. The art has a way of being subtle but still eye-catching. That combined with the relaxing ambiance of the soundtrack helps make the game immersive. Still the game isn't perfect. There is a small bug when you leave the app for anything that it shuts it down and makes you restart the day you were currently playing. The online play has never connected for me. Still the pass and play option is a good alternative. An option to play the game backwards would greatly increase the playability of this game. I am also waiting for the expansion. Though it false short; this app is a must and a wonderful alternative to those who can't get their fix with the board game.

it's a nice intro but there are bugs not listed that need to be worked on  1) can you please turn off "tutorial mode" I shouldn't have to de-select this in the options to play a regular game  2) Can you actually set up for a regular game - 3 days (time between inns is a day) is not a regular game, it should be 5.  3) remembering settings - not just tutorial, but it seems like I have to turn off the music every single time, even with login.  4) Advanced game play - not only should you have the 5 day trip, but the extended game of playing both ways on the journey - i.e. a 10 day trip.    5) in Pass in play, tapping your avatar's icon only gives you the first player's game info... you have to go to the icons at the bottom and tap your icon there to see you things -  this is confusing, most players expect "pass and play" to work like single player and tap on their character icon to get their progress.  6) no announcement for player turn in pass in play, as such we had to be very careful to watch for the character icon in the corner and remember which one is yours.

Hello Shawn,
it's due to plugins we add to the game like Facebook API, Push Notifications API, etc...
Some plugins need this permission to run even if we don't use these specific features and that's our case, Funforge will never make or manage your phone calls.
Best regards.

content: Lack of online play

Great simple game. I noticed the One Star Traveller achievement is broken as it hasn't unlocked. There is an online mode, but no players there (I tried both creating a room and joining). I also wish the final score BEFORE ending achievements showed for everyone and increased while showing the achievements resolved (similar to Ticket to Ride as it adds a little suspense in the end). And why is the iOS version half a dollar less than Android, even though Android is known to be a cheaper platform to publish on? Now enough of these minor quibbles.  I wish the expansions were included as it takes it from leap frog to a slightly more thinky game. Now you might think I dislike this app. I don't. The game has a Zen like feel that is great when I have 5 minutes to spare. Yes games take about 5 minutes to play and that may be why I like it for my phone. In fact most board games don't get me on the phone because 30+ minutes in a few play sessions or all at once when I'm alone is a tough ask. This game feels like a quick immersion into a vacation without the huge expense of one.  Having AI opponents is great, though I'd like difficulty options (as the AI doesn't always take the best scoring move and feel fairly easy to beat). Not sure how to implement a difficulty setting in a leap frog game though, but maybe the expansions would change that. The music is good for the game, but not quite memorable enough to start humming the tune in public. Overall, a well polished board game turned app that should work well for most mobile gamers (if they would actually spend money on something good rather than a Free to Play game).
Love it!
I wish I could give it five stars, but every time I attempt to start a game, it'll load for a bit, before the app exits itself. Other than that, do get it, and I hope it works for you!
replyContent:
Hello Maxwell,
1.04 has issues with 1Go devices. We will optimize Tokaido memory performances with the 1.05 to fix these issues.
Sorry for the inconvenience.
Thanks.

content: I'm not sure why this has received so many positive reviews for the digital and physical game. While it is okay for non-gamers, the play mechanic is too simplistic to keep even moderate gamers entertained. The minimalistic art style is okay overall but really quite stereotypical, particularly the eyes on the characters - most people in Japan do actually have eyes, not just thin slits.
Doesn't run on Asus Transformer T300
Gorgeous game with awesome gameplay. Best boardgame I've tried so far!
I'm disappointed in the lack of an online multi-player that I can set up with a friend. Online multi-player is random and when both of us are on, it shows no one available to play with.

This is a faithful adaptation of Tokaido but feels more like a video game than a board game due to the very streamlined and aesthetically pleasing interface that keeps all your collections really well organized, and because of the nicely done map that actually shows the little characters running around in the environment. I really like the feel of it. For me this is much nicer than playing on board game arena, and worth the cost. This is the best digital version of the game. My biggest suggestion for improvement is that the audio volume is very low even with my device volume turned all the way up. Hope to see the expansions soon!
Can't wait till they implement the expansions! Could we possibly get custom rules like pick starting character?
replyContent:
Hi John,
thanks for your feedback.
Picking a starting character and expansions are on your todo list. :)

content: Nice music and nice relaxing boardgames
Congrats on making a great app! I hope we get crossroads and matsuri! I think its ks worthy
I LOVE IT! I think is the most beautiful digital boardgame ever made. Great job!

Excellent digital rendition of the boardgame, and fwiw the animation speed does not bother me as it is. However it needs a save game for local games, also it lacks the option to add AI opponents in local pass&play this making it unplayable with 2 players. Update1: increased rating since it is now possible to play pass & play with 2 players. Please add save game for local games.

Developers seem to be lazy. I contacted them regarding a bug I have been experiencing that made the game unplayable  since the last update and demanded a refund but they still haven't answered my mail. The game adaption is good in theory but can be improved concerning some bugs. I only had the chance to play this game about seven times so far and experienced some bugs that made me start all over again. Otherwise I really like the game and wished the app would work properly. Update: I contacted Google and they said that they are unable to to do anything and I should contact the developer. They only want my money and offer no service. Besides I once had a similar situation in which I had requested a refund from the developer for an app and it was no problem for that developer to return my money.
replyContent:
Hello Catharina,
thanks for your update.
We succeed to find your purchase and the refund is done.
Best regards.

content: Very solid digital adaptation of the beloved board game. Hoping for Crossroads expansion!!!

replyContent:
Hello Eric, thanks for your feedback.
2 players Pass&Play will be added soon, we are working on it.
We hope you and your spouse will enjoy it together!
